verbs.description: < p > [ARG0: U.S. President Donald Trump] [V: fired] off [ARG1: a volley of tweets] [ARGM-TMP: Monday] [ARGM-ADV: venting anger on NATO allies , the European Union and Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau in the wake of a divisive G7 meeting over the weekend.</p] >

< p > [ARG0: U.S. President Donald Trump] fired off a volley of tweets Monday [V: venting] [ARG1: anger] [ARG2: on NATO allies , the European Union and Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau] in the wake of a divisive G7 meeting over the weekend.</p >
